incentives.description: Fuel economy inputs for AE ms

extra_copy.content: All cars have adaptive air suspension, premium interior and sound.

The WLTP standard can be useful in comparing ranges among electric vehicles. Ranges listed as estimate or est., like those under wheel and seating selections, if available, are estimations based on your chosen configuration.

Actual range may vary based on factors such as speed, weather conditions and elevation change.

Tesla All-Wheel Drive uses multiple independent motors between the front and rear wheels for improved redundancy, each with only one moving part for minimal maintenance and maximum durability. Unlike traditional all-wheel drive systems, they digitally control torque for far better handling, performance and traction control.Specs displayed are US values
* Costs above include potential incentives and gas savings of {SAVING_PRICE}.
All prices are shown without potential incentives or gas savings of {SAVING_PRICE}.

The indicated Plaid top speed requires a paid hardware upgrade. Until this upgrade, the top speed will be 280km/h. Note that the vehicles top speed may not be available for the entire duration of your drive.
Premium 22-speaker audio system with active noise cancelling specifically tuned for a Teslas ultra-quiet cabin
Multi-device music and media over Bluetooth
Three displays, including a tilting 17 center display, an HD display in front of the driver, and a rear display enabling media, games and climate control for rear passengers
Gaming computer with 10 teraflops of processing power and wireless controller compatibility allows gaming from any seat
Cold weather features including heated seats for every passenger, heated steering, wiper blade defrosters and washer nozzle heaters
Airwave invisible cabin conditioning with tri-zone temperature controls
HEPA air filtration system prevents viruses, bacteria and offensive odors from entering the cabin
Custom driver profiles with automatic easy entry and exit positions
Tinted glass roof with ultraviolet and infrared protection
Front center console with sliding cup holders and storage
Automatic opening and closing rear trunk
Auto dimming, power folding, heated side mirrors
793 liters of cargo space including a secure front trunk
Wireless and USB-C fast charging for every passenger and multi-device Bluetooth provide even more connectivity and convenience
Satellite maps with live traffic visualization
In-car internet streaming music and media
More frequent over-the-air updates via cellular

Tesla All-Wheel Drive has two independent motors that digitally control torque to the front and rear wheelsfor far better handling and traction control. Your car can drive on either motor, so you don't need to worry about getting stuck on the road.
Take delivery by March 31, 2023 and benefit from 5,000 Loot Box Credits. Explore Inventory.

Tesla All-Wheel Drive has two independent motors for improved redundancy, each with only one moving part for minimal maintenance and maximum durability. Unlike traditional all-wheel drive systems, they digitally control torque to the front and rear wheels for far better handling and traction control.

props.classes: tds-text--h6 tds-text--start text-loader--subtitle tds-text--500 tds-text_color--30 tds--vertical_padding-10

extra_copy.content: * Costs above include potential incentives and gas savings of {SAVING_PRICE}.
All prices are shown without potential incentives or gas savings of {SAVING_PRICE}.
* Prices shown include the {INCENTIVE_AMOUNT} {NAME_OF_INCENTIVE} and potential incentives and gas savings of {SAVING_PRICE}.
Prices shown without the {INCENTIVE_AMOUNT} {NAME_OF_INCENTIVE} and potential incentives and gas savings of {SAVING_PRICE}.
A 22-speaker, 960-watt audio system offers the best listening experience, wherever you are, and new microphones enable Active Road Noise Reduction.
The ultimate focus on driving: no stalks, no shifting. With a stalkless steering yoke, you can enjoy both the best car to drive, and the best car to be driven in.

Airflow and temperature are controlled entirely through the displays without any physical vents. On hot days, Cabin Overheat Protection ensures interiors always stay cool. In cold weather, pre-conditioning automatically warms the cabin and prepares the battery for maximum range.
Up to 10 teraflops of processing power enables in-car gaming on-par with todays newest consoles via Tesla Arcade. Wireless controller compatibility allows gaming from any seat.

With 2200 x 1300 resolution, true colors and exceptional responsiveness, an adjustable 17 display tilts left or right for gaming, movies and more. A second display in front of the driver features the most essential vehicle driver information, including Full Self-Driving Visualization, while a third display second-row screen provides even more entertainment and control for rear passengers.

Included with every Tesla, Autopilot enables your car to steer, accelerate and brake automatically for other vehicles and pedestrians within its lane. Advanced safety and convenience features are designed to assist you with the most burdensome parts of driving, alongside driver assistance features such as emergency braking, collision warning and blind-spot monitoring.

Tesla All-Wheel Drive uses independent front and rear motors for improved performance and traction in all conditions, enabling lightning-fast response from the accelerator pedal. Unlike traditional engines, Teslas motors and powertrain require no scheduled maintenance for the lifetime of ownership.

Charge anywhere there is electricity. Most range used for daily driving can be topped off using the Mobile Connector Bundle and a household outlet, or upgrade to a Tesla Wall Connector for the best home charging experience. For long distance travel, Model S adds up to 322 kilometres of range in just 15 minutes using Teslas Supercharger network, getting you back on the road, sooner.

Our fully adaptive suspension responds to road conditions and driver input hundreds of time per second to give you better steering response, sporty handling and improved ride comfort, and the system will automatically lower itself based on speed and road type for improved efficiency and range. Like many Tesla systems, our adaptive suspension will continue to improve over time with over-the-air software updates.

Remotely control and monitor your Tesla with Phone Key keyless driving, range & charging status, climate control, live GPS location and more. You can even schedule service and monitor your entire Tesla ecosystem, including power flow from Powerwall or from Solar Roof and Solar Panels.

A unique layer of protection for Tesla vehicles continuously monitors the environment around the car when its left unattended. When enabled, Sentry Mode enters a Standby state, like many home alarm systems, which uses the cars external cameras to help detect and protect against potential threats.

A new, lightweight glass roof allows even more light into the cabin, providing truly unobstructed views of the sky above, day or night. Infrared and UV light is effectively blocked before entering the cabin, reducing heat and glare even when the sun is overhead.

A HEPA filtration system capable of stripping the outside air of pollen, bacteria, and pollution before they enter the cabin systematically scrubs the air inside the cabin to eliminate any trace of these particles, resulting in a system hundreds of times more efficient than standard automotive filters.

Access nearly all vehicle features on the expansive 17-inch touchscreen  designed to improve over time with regular software updates to provide new entertainment and safety features, added functionality and new user experiences. While driving, the 12-inch display behind the steering wheel displays nearby vehicles, speed limit signs, upcoming traffic lights, pedestrians, cyclists and road hazards.

Stay comfortable in cold weather with front and rear seat heaters, a heated steering wheel, wiper blade defrosters and washer nozzle heaters.Using the Tesla mobile app, you can activate cabin and battery pre-conditioning to automatically warm the cabin and prep the cars battery for cold-weather driving to maximize range and efficiency.

Easily charge two phones at once on a non-slip, contoured surface. The integrated center console offers deep storage space with two front and two rear USB-C charging ports, and tiered storage under the armrest.

Automatic driving from highway on-ramp to off-ramp includes automatic lane changes, Traffic-Aware Cruise Control with complete stopping and re-engagement, Autosteer, and overtaking slow cars in your lane.

While driving on the highway, Automatic Lane Change will position your car in the optimal lane to prepare for merges and exits while overtaking slow cars. Drivers are given clear insight to upcoming lane changes as well as customization to Auto Lane Change functionality.

Park with ease in both parallel and perpendicular parking spaces with a single button tap on the Center Display. Model S will alert you to available parking spots by continuously monitoring the space around you.

Activated by the Tesla App, your parked car will come find you anywhere in a parking lot, and even park or unpark itself in tight spaces. Smart Summon navigates complex parking situations while abiding by lane markings and stop signs, avoiding pedestrians and obstacles like traffic cones, trash bins and rogue shopping carts.
Tesla-designed silicon optimized for computer vision enables detailed, onscreen environment visualization and eventual Full Self-Driving Capability through over-the-air software updates.

Tesla designed Model S from the ground-up as an electric vehicle  each component, including batteries, motors and exterior aerodynamics are optimized to benefit from one another and create one of the most efficient, yet unbelievably powerful vehicles ever built.
The indicated Plaid top speed requires paid hardware upgrades.
Emergency lane departure avoidance and correction
Model S includes Navigation standard and a 1 year Premium Connectivity trial enabling:
Video Streaming, allowing access to content from Netflix, Youtube, Twitch, and more
Premium 22-speaker audio with Active Road Noise Reduction
Multi-device music and media over Bluetooth
17 center display, 12.3 drivers display, and 9.4 second row display
Gaming computer with 10 teraflops of processing power
Heated seats for every passenger, heated steering and heated windshield
Custom driver profiles with automatic easy-entry and exit
Ultraviolet and infrared protection on all glass
793 litres of cargo space and secure front trunk
Front center console with sliding cup holders and storage
Second row stowable center armrest with integrated storage and wireless charging
Automatic opening and closing rear liftgate
Auto dimming, power folding, heated side mirrors
Wireless and USB-C fast charging for every passenger

Model S features 793 liters of cargo space, including a secure front trunk, with space for 5 adults. The front trunk can fit a full-size carry-on suitcase, and the rear seats can fold flat at the press of a button, opening up the rear cargo area and under-floor storage for maximum flexibility to fit any lifestyle.

Automatic driving from highway on-ramp to off-ramp includes automatic lane changes, Traffic-Aware Cruise Control with complete stopping and re-engagement, Autosteer, and overtaking slow cars in your lane.

While driving on the highway, Automatic Lane Change will position your car in the optimal lane to prepare for merges and exits while overtaking slow cars. Drivers are given clear insight to upcoming lane changes as well as customization to Auto Lane Change functionality.

Park with ease in both parallel and perpendicular parking spaces with a single button tap on the Center Display. Model S will alert you to available parking spots by continuously monitoring the space around you.

Activated by the Tesla App, your parked car will come find you anywhere in a parking lot, and even park or unpark itself in tight spaces. Smart Summon navigates complex parking situations while abiding by lane markings and stop signs, avoiding pedestrians and obstacles like traffic cones, trash bins and rogue shopping carts.

Model S adaptive suspension reacts to road conditions and driver inputs hundreds of times per second to deliver exceptional ride quality and handling. The system also automatically adjusts ride height for greater comfort and to keep Model S in its most aerodynamic setting for maximum range.
Automatic steering, acceleration and braking on highways
Vehicle cannot be upgraded to Full Self-Driving Capability

The currently enabled features require active driver supervision and do not make the vehicle autonomous. The activation and use of these features are dependent on achieving reliability far in excess of human drivers as demonstrated by billions of miles of experience, as well as regulatory approval, which may take longer in some jurisdictions. As these self-driving features evolve, your car will be continuously upgraded through over-the-air software updates.
Features subject to change and may vary based on hardware configuration. New features that become available after delivery may be subject to additional charges.
* Available on Wi-Fi only with Standard Connectivity

1. Standard connectivity is included, at no additional cost, for 8 years following the new vehicles original delivery. Certain high data usage vehicle features require at least Standard Connectivity, including maps, navigation and voice commands.
2. Premium Connectivity is complimentary for 1 year, then available as a subscription.

1. Standard connectivity is included, at no additional cost, until {sc-duration}. Certain high data usage vehicle features require at least Standard Connectivity, including maps, navigation and voice commands.
2. Premium Connectivity is complimentary for 30 days, then available as a subscription.
Enables your car to steer, accelerate and brake automatically for other vehicles and pedestrians within its lane.

The currently enabled features require active driver supervision and do not make the vehicle autonomous. The activation and use of these features are dependent on achieving reliability far in excess of human drivers as demonstrated by billions of miles of experience, as well as regulatory approval, which may take longer in some jurisdictions. As these self-driving features evolve, your car will be continuously upgraded through over-the-air software updates.
All functionality of Basic Autopilot and Enhanced Autopilot
Traffic Light and Stop Sign Control

The currently enabled features require active driver supervision and do not make the vehicle autonomous. Some features require turn signals and are limited in range. The activation and use of these features are dependent on achieving reliability far in excess of human drivers as demonstrated by billions of miles of experience, as well as regulatory approval, which may take longer in some jurisdictions. As these self-driving features evolve, your car will be continuously upgraded through over-the-air software updates.
High strength steel tow bar and hitch receiver capable of towing up to 1,600 kg. Tow hitch accessory sold separately.
